description: This file is a shell script that sets up and manages the WAN interface handlers on a device. It processes commands related to starting, stopping, restarting, and updating the WAN connection, and interacts with system services and events pertinent to WAN configuration.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main case statement handling different WAN service commands such as start, stop, restart, and processing specific events like phylink_wan_state or erouter_mode-updated.
